snippet.title: Backroom Company Trailer Video Cinematic SFX
snippet.description:
Backroom Company is a horror cooperative multiplayer action game in which you are trapped in Backroom Company, a place with randomly connected empty rooms due to an unknown supernatural phenomenon called Noclip, and you clear stages by collecting and selling items and scrap metal left behind by the previous expedition team. It applied the IP of The Backrooms as the basic worldview, and introduced the advantages of the item sales system of the recently popular Lethal Company game. In addition, it was planned to maximize immersion and fun by applying Backroom Company's unique play system.

백룸컴퍼니 스팀페이지 ▼ 찜하기 버튼 꼭 눌러주세요!!
Backroom Company Steam Page ▼ Please click the Add to Wishlist button!!
